404.title: Leqephe ha le fumanehe
404.doesNotExist: Tšoarelo, leqephe leo u neng u le batla ha le eo.
404.errorLogged: Re kentse phoso 'me re tla e sheba.

translate.title: Mohokahanyi oa Lipontšo

human-pose-viewer.loading: E kenya mofuta oa video oa motho

translate.description: Phetolelo ea Puo ea Matsoho e sa Lekanyetsoang e nang le Meetso ea Nako ea Sebele ea Cutting-Edge.

hero.title: Fetolela lipakeng tsa 40+ lipuo tsa matsoho le tse buuoang ka nako ea sebele.
hero.img: Mohlala oa phetolelo e phelang lipakeng tsa Puo ea Matsoho ea Amerika le Senyesemane

direction.spoken-to-signed: Fetolela ho tloha lipuong tse buuoang ho ea ho lipuo tsa matsoho
direction.signed-to-spoken: Kapa ho tloha lipuong tsa matsoho ho ea ho tse buuoang

real-time.title: Phetolelo ea Nako ea Sebele
real-time.subtitle: Fetolela lipakeng tsa lipuo tse 40+ tsa matsoho le tse buuoang ka nako ea sebele
real-time.description: Sesebelisoa sa rona se u lumella ho buisana ka mokhoa oa tlhaho le ha bonolo le mang kapa mang, kae kapa kae, neng kapa neng, ka puo ea hau ea matsoho.

multilingual.title: Tšehetso ea Lipuo Tse Ngata
multilingual.subtitle: Fetolela lipakeng tsa lipuo tse fapaneng tsa matsoho le lipuo tse buuoang
multilingual.description: Sesebelisoa sa rona se tšehetsa lipuo tse ngata tsa matsoho le lipuo tse buuoang, kahoo o ka buisana le batho ba tsoang linaheng le litso tse fapaneng.

appearance.title: Customizable Ponahalo
appearance.subtitle: Li-avatar tsa rona tsa 'nete tsa puo ea matsoho li fana ka mefuta e mengata e fapaneng ea khetho ho lumellana le litlhoko tsa hau tse ikhethang.
appearance.description: Hore na o batla ho etsa avatar e ts'oanang le uena kapa ho theha sebapali se ikhethileng, likhetho tsa rona tsa ho itlhophisa li u lumella ho itlhalosa ka tsela e ikutloang e le 'nete ho uena.

open-source.title: Open Source Project
open-source.subtitle: Sign Translate ke morero o bulehileng, o lumellang sechaba ho kenya letsoho le ho ntlafatsa likarolo tsa oona.
open-source.description: Ka ho arolelana khoutu ea rona ea mohloli, re ikemiselitse ho khothaletsa tšebelisano 'moho le ponaletso.

offline.title: Ts'ebetso ea Offline
offline.subtitle: Saena Translate e sebetsa hohle, esita le ntle le inthanete sefofaneng.
offline.description: Ebang o leetong, o le sebakeng se hole, kapa o se na inthanete, sesebelisoa sa rona se netefatsa hore o khona ho fetolela puo e buuoang kapa e ngotsoeng puong ea matsoho, e boloka lisebelisoa tsa bohlokoa tsa puisano li le matsohong a hau.

text-to-speech.unavailable: Voice output ha e fumanehe bakeng sa puo e khethiloeng

speech-to-text.not-allowed: U hloka tumello ea ho sebelisa maekrofounu
speech-to-text.language-not-supported: Puo e khethiloeng ha e tšehetsoe
speech-to-text.browser-not-supported: Voice input ha e sebetse ho porausara ena
speech-to-text.service-not-allowed: U hloka tumello ea ho sebelisa temoho ea puo

playground.title: Lebala la ho Etsa Puo ea Matsoho

pose.title: Khakanyo ea Boemo ba 'mele o Feletseng

files.avatarUsdz: 3D Avatar bakeng sa AR ho iOS

actions.delete: Hlatsoa Cache ea Moetso oa Offline
